mdRecord.dcterms:description: Prime meridians: Greenwich and Washington, D.C.
Entered according to Act of Congress in the year 1855 by J. H. Colton & Co. in the Clerk's Office of the District Court of the United States for the Southern District of New York..
Explanations: Rail roads; Common roads; State capitals; Cities; County towns; Villages, P.O. &c.
Appeared in: Colton's Atlas of the World..., 1856.
Plate "No. 38." printed in lower right corner outside border.
